snippet.title: Cataclismo - Gameplay Trailer | Base Building RTS/Tower Defense
snippet.description:
Build your castle brick-by-brick as you defend humanity against swarms of horrors with Calaclismo, releasing July 2024!

In Cataclismo, players must design fortresses, optimize production in the citadel, train and deploy a wide range of troops, and make impactful tactical choices as they fight to defend the last bastion of Humanity.

➤ STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1422440/Cataclismo/

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse

Follow us on social media:
➤ Discord: https://discord.gg/hoodedhorse 
➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoodedHorseInc
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/

https://www.youtube.com/HoodedHorse

Video Details:
